articles.title: Exclusive: the Sonos Move 2 is coming in September with stereo sound and 24-hour battery life - The Verge
articles.description: Sonos plans to release its latest portable speaker, the Move 2, in late September. The new model will have upgraded sound, USB-C line in, and much longer battery life than its predecessor.
